UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Evaluation of the Antimicrobial Properties of a Natural Peptide from Vespa mandarinia Venom and Its Synthetic Analogues as a Possible Route to Defeat Drug-Resistant Microbes.
Literature.Author: Zhang J, Sun R, Chen Z, Zhou C, Ma C, Zhou M, Chen X, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=1µM)
